name: Head Movement Detection

inputs.name: Detect
inputs.description: The head to detect the movement. “Head 0” represents the first head appearing in the scene, “Head 4” represents the fifth head appearing in the scene. “Any” represents any head in the scene.

inputs.name: Head Movement
inputs.description: The movement on face, including “Head Shake” and “Head Nod”.

outputs.name: Begin
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the movement starts

outputs.name: Stay
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the movement is in progress

outputs.name: End
outputs.description: Execute the next node when the movement ends

outputs.name: None
outputs.description: Keep executing the next node when the certain head movement is not detected

description: Detect the head movement in the scene.
